document.full_text: a deal to remove yemen's president ali abdullah saleh looked all but dead on monday, raising the threat of more turmoil and violence in a country wracked by civil conflict and islamist insurgency.
document.title: yemen power deal unraveling as saleh still defiant
lines_and_colors: a deal to remove yemen's president ali abdullah saleh looked all but dead on monday, raising the threat of more turmoil and violence in a country wracked by civil conflict and islamist insurgency.
